paragraph.heading: 1EiffelStudio Introduction
paragraph.paragraph:
EiffelStudio is the new Eiffel compiler by Interactive Software Engineering. It includes not only a
30_compiler/20_command_line/00_introduction.xml command line compiler , but also a powerful IDE with several unique features, such as an
50_diagram_tool/00_introduction.xml integrated reverse engineering tool and a
60_metric_tool/00_introduction.xml quantitative code analyzer .
To get started, follow the provided guided tour.

To see the new features and improvements over previous versions of the ISE Eiffel environment, have a look at the
02_what_s_new/ What's new section .
An quick overview of the new graphical interface is available 05_general_interface_description/20_eiffelstudio_window_overview.xmlhere.
